content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=-6.0, y=24.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)
-  Wooden chest at position(x=43.5, y=-82.5) and position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Iron plate factory
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Lab at position(x=unknown)
Consists of lab with input {'automation-science-pack': 67}

### Inserter system at position(x=3.5, y=0.5)
Consists of burner inserter at position(x=3.5, y=0.5) and wooden chest at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)

### Inserter system at position(x=0.5, y=3.5)
Consists of burner inserter at position(x=0.5, y=3.5) and wooden chest at position(x=0.5, y=2.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using extracting but being too far
-  Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items
### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing
### Errors when refueling entities
- Ensure the entity is out of fuel before attempting to refuel
### Errors when using pipes
- Ensure the pipe is connected to a valid entity before attempting to use it
### Errors when using inserter
- Ensure the inserter has a valid pickup and drop position before attempting to use it
### Errors when using lab
- Ensure the lab has a valid input before attempting to use it
### Errors when managing inventory
- Ensure the agent has enough space in the inventory before attempting to pick up items
- Ensure the agent has the required items in the inventory before attempting to use them
